ygData.subject: Re: Doctrine of Wizardry
ygData.msgSnippet: not entirely... what about the kite tactic of druids and Shaman?  Cast SOW on yourself.. then a DOT spell like Tainted Breath or Stinging Swarm.  Run in
ygData.messageBody:
not entirely... what about the "kite" tactic of druids and Shaman? Cast SOW
on yourself.. then a DOT spell like Tainted Breath or Stinging Swarm. Run
in circles.... stopping to cast every so often... till the monster is
dead..

Same thing different Tactic. there are always going to be "loopholes" in
the game for certain combinations to kill certain monsters.

Vumar
